title: सफ़ूरा ज़रगर की प्रेग्नेंसी और अविवाहित होने का दावा करते हुए उनपर कीचड़ उछालने की कोशिश
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Safura Zargar, a law student of unmarried Jamia, who is currently lodged in Tihar Jail, came to the fore regarding the incitement of riot in Shahin Bagh, Delhi. When the #corona test was done in the jail, she turned out to be two months pregnant #mondaythoughts#MondayMotivationpic.twitter.com/jch5oKtYJy
